entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
